Package org.wso2.carbon.repository.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Collection
    The Collection Interface.
    Repository
    This is the "Full" Repository interface.
    RepositoryService
    This interface can be used to implement an OSGi Service of the Repository.
    Resource
    Interface to represent a resource that is stored in the repository.
    SimulationService
    An API that can be used to implement a simulator to simulate handler execution.
    TransactionManager
    This describes an instance of the manager class that can be used to manage transactions on the back-end database.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity
    Representation of an activity that has been performed on the repository.
    RepositoryConstants
    Constants used in the registry which are exposed to be used in APIs + used across packages.
    ResourcePath
    This class represents resource paths used inside the repository.
